description: A score that provides a weighted indicator of device performance, stability, responsiveness and user sentiment.
Scores overall system performance considering load and throughput of processor, memory and disk resources.
Scores overall system stability, considering the frequency of operating system and software crashes and hangs and service failures.
Scores overall system responsiveness, considering the timeliness of operating system startup and system resource creation and availability.
Scores the user's perception or opinion related to their device performance, stability and responsiveness collected via Sentiment Survey(s).
The number of software crashes (where an application terminates unexpectedly).
The number of software hangs (where an application becomes unresponsive).
The number of service failures (where a service fails to start of shutdown correctly).
The number of seconds taken for the device to boot to the logon prompt.
The number of operating system upgraded
The number of operating system crashes (Blue Screens, or unexpected shutdowns).
